column4: using X-Chat Gnome, it auto connects to #ubuntu channel everytimes it starts, how to add more channels for auto starts
XChat --> Network List, and tell me when you're there.
see on Network list where it says Ubuntu servers?
have channel listing but not server listing
uhh, when you open xchat-gnome, you get a login screen, right?  Where yo ucan change your nick, your real name, etc?
it auto connects, asking of nick is only the very first time I started this application
at the top, click edit --> preferences
select Ubuntu Servers under "Networks", and then click "Edit" on the right side of the screen.
then select the option that lists "Channels", and you'll see a tab that works :)
did you follow the instructoins I gave you?
It don't appear at all, It always force me or auto connect to ubuntu server everytime
